Package Classes.Table

Class TableManager

java.lang.Object
Classes.Table.TableManager
public class TableManager extends Object
The Table Manager class manages the collection of tables in the restaurant

2021-11-02

    • findTableForWalkIn

      public static int findTableForWalkIn​(int pax)
      Find a table to accommodate for a walk-in customer. Return the ID of the table found.
      Parameters:
      pax - Number of customers
      Returns:
      ID of the table found

    • printTableAvailabilities

      public static void printTableAvailabilities()
      Find and print all tables with status "EMPTY".

    • printTableStatusByDateAndSession

      public static void printTableStatusByDateAndSession​(LocalDate date, Reservation.ReservationSession session, boolean now)
      Print the status of the tables in a given date and session. If now is set, the function will print the results of the current session. The tables will be available, reserved or occupied. If now is not set, the function will print the result in future. The tables will be either available or reserved.
      Parameters:
      date - Date of interest
      session - Session of interest. AM or PM.
      now - boolean to determine whether to print the current status or the future

    • getComplement

      public static ArrayList<Table> getComplement​(ArrayList<Table> input)
      Get the complement among all tables of a given set of tables.
      Parameters:
      input - the given set of tables
      Returns:
      the complement of the input

    • updateTableStatus

      public static void updateTableStatus()
      If the current time is within a session of operation, update the table status to "RESERVED" if the table is reserved in the current session. Else the function returns.
